newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean firms to seek 22,500T U.S. wheat - traders.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean firms to seek 22,500T U.S. wheat - traders.

text.p: South Korea's Cheiljedang Corp and Dongah Flour Mills Co Ltd have joinlty invited tenders to buy 22,500 tonnes of U.S. No.1 wheat by 2:00 p.m. (0500 GMT) on Thursday, traders said on Wednesday.
Of the total, Cheiljedang wants to buy 9,500 tonnes at basis prices over September futures on the U.S. grain futures exchanges including the Chicago Board of Trade, traders said.
Dongah seeks to buy the remaining 13,000 tonnes at fixed prices, they said.
Shipment was set for July 1-31 to the port of Pusan.
